page.title: 17MR.& MRS.DICKER LANGLEY VALE
page.content: Mr.& Mrs. Dicker have lived in the village for 63 years. There was{no {water}laid on when they first came here so they had to get it from the {village pump.}There were{no sewers and {the toilets were outside.}There were no houses opposite the school only fields. They had{no electricity only {oil.}They like living here because it is open countryside and they like village life. There are no rough people or hooligans. They would like to see a better bus service in the village and a full time road sweeper. In his spare time Mr. Dicker gardens and walks the dog and helps his wife to clean the school.{Mrs Dicker is the {school caretaker. Mr. Dicker is a bus {driver}and works for London Country, Leatherhead. He has worked for them for 37 years.
